text: Keisuke to eichi to yogen-sha to shite no tenbun o arr훮 kara itadaita hitori no ningendearinagara,-go ni natte hitobito ni mukai,`anata gata wa arr훮 no soto ni, watashi o s큰hai shi nasai.' To wa ienai. Mushiro `anata gata wa,-nushi no ch큰jitsu nashi mo be to nari nasai. Anata gata wa keiten o oshie rarete iru nodearu. Sore o seijitsu ni manabi nasai.' To (iubekidearu)
